long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome browser bookmark management plugin. The features include:

- Fuzzy search for saved bookmarks.
- Display the top 5 bookmarks based on click count.
- Ability to delete the bookmark with the highest click count.
- Option to set bookmarks as favorites.
- Ability to delete favorite bookmarks.
